contact.title: Contact
contact.invite: Have news to share? Send your news items, images and dates to the email below. We'll review and post them.
contact.instructions: Please include a short summary, suggested publish date and any images (attachments or links).

about.title: About Tandonia
about.overview: The Tandonia project aims to monitor and document slug and snail populations across Belgium.
about.how_it_works: Volunteers select a grid cell on the map and record observations from three habitat types: forest, swamp and anthropogenous areas.
about.get_involved: Create an account and start submitting checklists!
